step_feedback.feedback: Good job stretching your arm overhead. Try to keep your elbow straighter for better resistance.
Your elbow position is improving. Focus on keeping it straighter as you reach overhead.
Your hand is opening well. Remember to keep your elbow as straight as possible while opening.
Great job making a fist and tightening your muscles. Ensure your elbow stays straight throughout the movement.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with the overhead pumping exercise. Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and your elbow tight. Focus on opening your hand wide and making a strong fist with each breath.
